## useMarketplace() function

Returns a Marketplace contract instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useMarketplace(contractAddress?: string): Marketplace | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contractAddress | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the address of the Marketplace contract, found in your thirdweb dashboard |

<b>Returns:</b>

Marketplace \| undefined
